publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2874 Rhona Brankin: The Draft Mental Health (Safeguards for Certain Informal Patients) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Safeguards for Certain Informal Patients) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*

S2M-2874 Rhona Brankin:The Draft Mental Health (Safeguards for Certain Informal Patients) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Safeguards for Certain Informal Patients) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr
